items.content_html: This project is a simple web application built using a frontend framework that displays random quotes with the click of a button. It allows users to explore various quotes and offers a refreshing and dynamic experience. The app is lightweight, easy to use, and a perfect example of how to integrate API data into a web project.
items.title: RedHatPixel/random-quote-generator: This project is a simple web application built using a frontend framework that displays random quotes with the click of a button. It allows users to explore various quotes and offers a refreshing and dynamic experience. The app is lightweight, easy to use, and a perfect example of how to integrate API data into a web project.

items.content_html: "DocuComp is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to streamline the management of technical documentation and compliance tasks for developers. With DocuComp, you can efficiently organize, access, and collaborate on documentation, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulatory requirements.

Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
